photoeffects: My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Positive Film, Lighter Skin Tone, Darker Skin Tone, Vivid Blue, Vivid Green, Vivid Red, Custom Color
focusingrange: Normal: 2.0 in. (5cm) - infinity (W), 4.3 ft. (1.3m) - infinity (T) Auto: 0 in (0cm) - infinity (W), 4.3 ft. (1.3m) - infinity (T) Sports: 3.3 ft. (1m) - infinity (W), 43 ft. (13m) - infinity (T) Macro AF: 0 in. - 1.6 ft. (0-50cm) (W)
erasemodes: Select Image, Select Range, Select All Images
exposurecompensation: Still Images: ±3 stops in 1/3-stop increments Videos: ±3 stops in 1/3-stop increments (not available during shooting)
shootingcapacity: Approx. 315 shots when using LCD monitor Approx. 335 shots when using Electronic Viewfinder
continuousshooting: 1) Normal: Approx. 2.2 shots/sec. (in P mode) Approx. 13 shots/sec. (in High-Speed Burst HQ) 2) AF: Approx. 0.8 shots/sec. (in P mode) Approx. 4.1 shots/sec. (in High-Speed Burst HQ) 3) LV: Approx. 0.9 shots/sec. (in P mode)
playbackmodesfilevideos: Normal Playback, Slow Motion, Skip Backward, Previous Frame, Next Frame, Skip Forward, Erase chapters, Editing
exposurecontrolmethod: Manual Exposure, Program Shift, Safety Shift, AE Lock
jpegcompressionmode: Still Image: Exif. 2.3 (JPEG) Video: MOV (Image: H.264; Audio: Linear PCM (Stereo))
whitebalancecontrol: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Custom 1, Custom 2
lcdmonitor: 2.8-inch TFT Color Vari-angle LCD with wide viewing angle
shutterspeed: 1-1/2000 sec. 15-1/2000 sec. (in Tv and M modes)
videoout: NTSC/PAL (dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video) Mini-HDMI connector
audioout: Stereo (dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video)
shootingmodes: C1, C2, M, Av, Tv, P, Auto, Movie Digest, Sports, SCN, Creative Filters, Movie
builtinflash: Auto, Flash On, Slow Synchro, Flash Off
playbackmodesfilestillsvideos: Auto Rotate (Automatic vertical/horizontal detection), Index Continuous Display, Image Advance (Operation Tools, Transition Effects, Scroll Display), Rotate, Favorites, My Category, Smart Shuffle, Group Playback, Movie Digest, Slideshow (Playback Interval, Repeat, Effect, Playlist)
